title: missing months in atmospheric NorESM2-LM Emon output v20190815
description: A bug in post-processing caused that every second month is missing in atmospheric NorESM2-LM Emon output v20190815. The affected data has been retracted and fixed data using a new dataset version will be published soon. The affected Emon fields are hus, loadbc, loaddust, loadpoa, loadss, ps, rsdsdiff, ua, va and wap.
